description: Styles for the Coffee App frontend including theme management, responsive design, and animation for the app logo.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that centers text and manages background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with configurable background and alignment.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link element with color transitioning effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with hover effects.
